snippet.title: Dead Island 2 – HAUS – Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Dead Island 2’s first expansion story – Haus – is out today. 

Set within a mysterious villa in Malibu, where the boundaries of morality are somewhat vague, you will need to investigate the secrets of a cult -  and its enigmatic leader – as they slug it out amid the Zompocalypse. 

You can tool up with a range of new weapons – as they hack and slash their way through a deranged labyrinth of biomes 

#DeadIsland2 #SeeYouInHellA #Dambuster #SeeYouInHouse

Dead Island 2 Haus is out now on PlayStation®4, PlayStation®5, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One and PC (Epic Games Store).  
 
Web: https://www.DeadIsland.com 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/DeadIslandGame 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DeadIslandGame 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/DeadIslandGame
